refnamediv.refpurpose: Run arbitrary commands in debspawn container session

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This subcommand allows you to run arbitrary commands in an ephemeral debspawn container, using the same environment that is normally used for building packages.
&command; is explicitly designed to be used by other tools for custom applications, and usually, you will want to use debspawn build instead to build Debian packages.
